trans-unit.source: Provides an XHTML adapter class for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个 XHTML 适配器类，用于<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: Control or device developers can inherit the XhtmlCalendarAdapter to create a custom adapter to take advantage of a new kind of target device, or to support a custom version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: 控件或设备的开发人员可以继承 XhtmlCalendarAdapter 创建自定义适配器以利用一种新的目标设备，或以支持自定义版本的<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A custom adapter might override the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A> methods to change how the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar> is first presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 自定义适配器可能会重写<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A>方法来更改如何<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar>首先向用户显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnLoad%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Or, you might change <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A> to track different information about the state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可能会更改<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A>来跟踪不同的适配器的状态的信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.LoadAdapterState%2A>

trans-unit.source: You might change <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> to modify data structures for a custom calendar, or add custom processing to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A> method to take advantage of new capabilities in a specific target device.
trans-unit.target: 你可能会更改<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>若要为自定义日历，修改数据结构或添加到自定义处理<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A>方法以利用特定的目标设备中的新功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.Render%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new target device might also have special needs that require modification to the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 新的目标设备还可能需要修改的特殊需求<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.HandlePostBackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Returns a strongly typed reference to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联控件的强类型化的引用。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"> </xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*> according to the user's actions on any primary or secondary page of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 集<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>根据用户的操作上的任何主要或次要页<xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar"></xref>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> displays on one or more pages of a mobile device.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>在移动设备的一个或多个页上显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user takes an action on one of those pages, this event handler processes the user's response and determines if the user is done with the calendar and whether the adapter should call <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>, or if the user should be directed to one of the secondary pages of the control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户对这些页之一执行操作时，此事件处理程序处理用户的响应，并确定用户借助日历和适配器是否应调用<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>，或如果用户应定向到该控件的辅助页之一。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.ExitSecondaryUIMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The target <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*> expressed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 目标<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>表示为字符串。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> because the method always handles the event.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>因为此方法始终处理该事件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the adapter and sets the current <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>.
trans-unit.target: 加载的适配器的状态和设置当前<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlControlAdapter.SecondaryUIMode*>

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: Called by the page adapter when loading view state.
trans-unit.target: 加载视图状态时，由页适配器调用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing the state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含的适配器的状态。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*> for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*>有关详细信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlCalendarAdapter.SaveAdapterState*>

trans-unit.source: Creates event handlers, determines how many months the target device can display, and if the request is not a postback, sets the current date as the calendar's visible date.
trans-unit.target: 创建事件处理程序，确定多少个月目标设备可以显示，如果请求不是回发，则将当前日期设置为的日历可见日期。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Load"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Fills the display list with eras if the user has selected a date and the user's current culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户选择日期和用户的当前区域性支持纪元用纪元填充显示列表。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This method uses <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> to discover whether the user's current culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>来发现用户的当前区域性支持纪元。</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>对象。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Renders the calendar, a page of the calendar, or a page of selection options, depending on the user's actions.
trans-unit.target: 呈现日历、 日历，一页或选择选项，具体取决于用户的操作的页。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.XhtmlAdapters.XhtmlMobileTextWriter"> </xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: 保存适配器的当前的状态。

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此 API 已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: 了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅[www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web 站点。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the page adapter during <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobilePage.SaveViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>期间由页适配器调用此方法

trans-unit.source: The state of the adapter can include the following information, returned inclusively in the following order: - <xref:System.Object> containing the state of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 适配器的状态可以包含以下信息，返回 （含） 按以下顺序:-<xref:System.Object>包含基本类的状态</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: - `integer` representing the user's currently selected option.
trans-unit.target: -`integer`表示用户的当前选择的选项。

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A> of the currently selected date.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>的当前选定的日期。</xref:System.DateTime.Ticks%2A>

trans-unit.source: - `integer` representing the number of eras if the current user's culture supports eras.
trans-unit.target: -`integer`表示纪元的数，如果当前用户的区域性支持纪元。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> containing information about the current state of the adapter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含适配器的当前状态有关的信息。</xref:System.Object>
